arts.ttl: Pressure mounts as St.Pauli coach Blessin reflects on a "deserved victory" for Freiburg
arts.sum: St. Pauli slipped to another defeat - this time in Breisgau - as head coach Alexander Blessin reacted to the 2-1 loss.

arts.ttl: Maximilian Eggestein stars as Freiburg beat St. Pauli
arts.sum: Goals from Yuito Suzuki and Maximilian Eggestein helped secure Freiburg their second home win of the season after overcoming a defensively resilient St. Pauli side that showed determination before slipping to a seventh straight defeat. The breakthrough finally came five minutes before the interval when Beste's inswinging corner was partially cleared by Vasilj, only for Suzuki to volley home the rebound from close range for his first Bundesliga goal.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: SC Freiburg vs. FC St. Pauli
arts.sum: Here are the lineups for the first of the three Bundesliga encounters on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. St. Pauli preview: Two sides looking to get back to winning ways
arts.sum: Freiburg welcome St. Pauli to Europa Park-Stadion on Sunday afternoon, with both sides looking to get back to winning ways in the Bundesliga.
